description:
A multi-purpose Visual Studio plugin for developers and managers

dbForge Fusion for SQL Server is a multi-featured plugin for Visual Studio that targets several essential areas of database development and administration. It covers the functionality of several SQL tools at once, focusing on SQL coding and debugging, query profiling, database diagrams, comparing and syncing databases, data import/export, analysis, and reporting. 

Features of code auto-completion, snippets, and formatting help users produce high-quality SQL code to perform all kinds of tasks related to the SQL Server database development and management. T-SQL Debugger allows you to debug the stored procedures and other queries. The Query Profiler identifies slow queries and causes of slow performance. 

Users can check and analyze the database versions, including their schemas with all objects and data. After analyzing the differences, the tools can synchronize the databases in real-time, or let the user schedule the database synchronization. Also, a separate database diagram feature allows you to review the structure of the current database quickly with all its essential objects and their inter-relations. 

The data import/export feature supports the processes for over 10 data formats and provides templates for setting the standard tasks. 

dbForge Fusion for SQL Server is perfectly integrated with Visual Studio. It improves the default functionality and provides those options Visual Studio lacks, in the same habitual interface.
summary: A multi-purpose Visual Studio plugin for developers and managers
author: Devart
